test.create_query: CREATE TABLE data(k BIGINT, v BIGINT) ENGINE = olap DUPLICATE KEY(k) DISTRIBUTED BY HASH(k) PROPERTIES ( "storage_medium" = "HDD", "replication_num" = "1" )
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO data SELECT number, 1 from numbers_10000000
test.query: SELECT count(k) FROM (SELECT k FROM data, numbers_20 _a) as _b
